translations: v．敬礼，致敬：向某人表示尊敬或敬意的行为，通常是通过举手、鞠躬或其他礼节。
· The soldiers were saluting their commanding officer.
士兵们向他们的指挥官敬礼。

sentences.sentence: I told the scouts to stop saluting me, "he said."
sentences.translation: 他说，“我告诉巡防队员不必朝我敬礼。”

sentences.sentence: When he returned to Rostov, Mr. Hong was greeted by saluting fans at the airport.
sentences.translation: 当他返回罗斯托夫时，球迷们在机场热烈欢迎他的到来。

sentences.sentence: As if instructed to do so, my twin brothers bolted upright and stood beside me, saluting.
sentences.translation: 仿佛有人指挥一样，我的两个双胞胎哥哥，走到我旁边，立正，然后敬礼。
